code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{CartContext}from'../../context/cart.context';import Button from'../button/button.component';import'./product-cart.style.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCart=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{name,price,imageUrl}=product;const{addItemToCart}=useContext(CartContext);const addItemToCartHendler=()=>addItemToCart(product);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-cart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageUrl,alt:`${name}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price",children:["$",price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{buttonType:"inverted",onClick:addItemToCartHendler,children:"Add to card"})]});};export default ProductCart;
